name: Outlast: The Murkoff Account (1)
summary: Paul Marion and Pauline Glick are recovering after the former sabotaged Murkoff. While Marion is telling his story to the FBI after giving himself up, Glick is helping Murkoff find her former colleague. They start at the beginning of their work together, back in late 2008, when they investigated the Hatbox Murders among the patients of a Murkoff institution, the Spindeltop Psychotherapy Clinic for Iraq veterans in Hattin, Texas.
